attributes.action: Make sexual harassment a criminal offence
attributes.additional_details:
Sexual harassment can be a one-off incident or an ongoing pattern of behaviour
It can include:
1.unwanted flirting , gesturing or making sexual remarks (this includes cat calling) about someone's body, clothing or appearance towards someone you do not know
2.emailing, texting or messaging sexual content displaying pornographic or sexual images on posters , calendars and cards in a non-consensual manner
3.continuously touching someone despite being told no

Note : Asking for contact details/one's social media does not count as harassment  unless one continuously persists after being told no
attributes.background: modules/sessions on consent, being mindful or respectful to others must not be optional and it must be taught as early as the ages of 13 in secondary schools

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
